revised_title: Treatment and Prevention of Dog Diseases and Bites
tldr: This article discusses various types of diseases that affect dogs and provides remedies for treating dog bites and diseases. The author describes five types of dog diseases, including hot madness, running madness, la rage mue, falling madness, and blasting or withering. They also share several effective treatments for dog bites, such as using Virginia snake-root and flowers of St. John's wort, or applying an old cock's feathers to the bite. These treatments can help prevent the spread of diseases and save lives.
